query:
INSERT INTO implementationGuides (title, description, category, steps, tools, estimatedTime, difficulty, prerequisites, expectedOutcome, tierRequired) VALUES

('Email Automation Quick Start',
'Learn how to automate your business email writing in 15 minutes using AI, saving 4-6 hours per week on customer communication and follow-ups.',
'Communication',
'STEP 1: Choose Your Email Type
Identify which emails take the most time: customer inquiries, follow-ups, or internal communication.

STEP 2: Select the Right Prompt
Use the Email Accelerator prompt: "Write an email to [recipient type] about [topic]. The tone should be [professional/friendly/persuasive]. Include these key points: [1-3 points]. End with a clear call to action asking for [specific action]."

STEP 3: Customize for Your Business
Replace all [brackets] with your specific information. Add your brand voice guidelines.

STEP 4: Generate and Review
Paste into ChatGPT, review the output, and personalize with your unique perspective.

STEP 5: Create a Template Library
Save your best-performing prompts for reuse. Refine based on response rates.',
'ChatGPT (free version), Email client, Text editor for prompt templates',
'15 minutes initial setup, 5 minutes per email thereafter',
'beginner',
'Basic email writing skills, ChatGPT account (free)',
'Reduce email writing time by 70%, improve consistency, maintain professional tone, save 4-6 hours per week',
'free'),

('Content Creation Automation',
'Set up a systematic process for creating social media posts, blog content, and marketing copy using AI, saving 3-5 hours per week.',
'Marketing',
'STEP 1: Define Your Content Calendar
Identify what content you need weekly: social posts, blog articles, newsletters.

STEP 2: Use the Content Creator Prompt
"Create a [blog post/social media post/newsletter] about [topic] for my [business type] targeting [audience]. Keep it [length] and make sure to emphasize [key benefit/message]."

STEP 3: Implement the AI Integration Cycle
Weekly planning → Draft prompts → Generate content → Review & personalize → Track performance.

STEP 4: Build Your Prompt Library
Save successful prompts for different content types and audiences.

STEP 5: Measure and Optimize
Track engagement metrics and refine prompts based on what performs best.',
'ChatGPT or Claude, Content calendar tool, Analytics platform',
'30 minutes initial setup, 45 minutes per week ongoing',
'beginner',
'Basic understanding of your target audience, Social media accounts',
'Consistent content production, 70% time savings, improved engagement rates, scalable content system',
'starter'),

('Customer Service Response Automation',
'Automate customer inquiry responses while maintaining a personal touch, saving 5-8 hours per week on customer support.',
'Customer Service',
'STEP 1: Categorize Common Inquiries
List your top 10 most frequent customer questions or issues.

STEP 2: Use the Customer Whisperer Prompt
"Write a response to this customer inquiry: [paste inquiry]. Be [helpful/apologetic/informative] while emphasizing our commitment to [core value]. Offer [specific solution] and end with [next step]."

STEP 3: Create Response Templates
Generate AI responses for each common inquiry type and save as templates.

STEP 4: Train Your Team
Show team members how to customize templates for specific situations.

STEP 5: Monitor Quality
Regularly review responses to ensure they maintain your brand voice and customer satisfaction standards.',
'ChatGPT, Customer service platform, Response template library',
'1 hour initial setup, 2 hours per week ongoing',
'beginner',
'List of common customer inquiries, Brand voice guidelines',
'Faster response times, consistent quality, reduced support workload by 60%, improved customer satisfaction',
'lite'),

('Meeting Documentation System',
'Transform meeting notes into actionable summaries with clear next steps in minutes instead of hours.',
'Productivity',
'STEP 1: Record or Take Notes
Capture meeting discussions through notes or transcription.

STEP 2: Use the Meeting Maximizer Prompt
"Summarize these meeting notes in bullet points, highlighting: 1) Key decisions made, 2) Action items with owners, and 3) Deadlines. [Paste your meeting notes here]"

STEP 3: Generate Summary
Paste notes into ChatGPT and generate structured summary.

STEP 4: Review and Distribute
Quickly review for accuracy and send to team members.

STEP 5: Track Action Items
Use the summary to follow up on commitments and deadlines.',
'ChatGPT, Meeting note-taking app, Project management tool',
'5 minutes per meeting',
'beginner',
'Meeting notes or transcription, Basic project management knowledge',
'Save 2-3 hours per week, improve accountability, ensure nothing falls through cracks, faster follow-up',
'free'),

('Competitive Analysis Automation',
'Quickly research and analyze competitors to identify differentiation opportunities, saving 4-5 hours per week on market research.',
'Strategy',
'STEP 1: Identify Key Competitors
List 3-5 direct competitors in your market.

STEP 2: Use the Competitive Edge Finder Prompt
"Analyze these 3 competitors in the [industry]: [Competitor 1], [Competitor 2], and [Competitor 3]. Identify their strengths, weaknesses, and what my [business type] can do differently to stand out in the Australian market."

STEP 3: Enable Web Search
Use ChatGPT with web browsing enabled for current information.

STEP 4: Analyze Results
Review the competitive analysis and identify actionable insights.

STEP 5: Create Differentiation Strategy
Use insights to refine your unique value proposition and marketing messaging.',
'ChatGPT with web search, Competitor website list, Market research tools',
'45 minutes initial analysis, 30 minutes monthly updates',
'intermediate',
'List of competitors, Understanding of your target market',
'Clear competitive positioning, identify market gaps, data-driven strategy, save 4-5 hours per week on research',
'starter');
command:

Capture meeting discussions through notes or transcription.

"Summarize these meeting notes in bullet points, highlighting: 1) Key decisions made, 2) Action items with owners, and 3) Deadlines. [Paste your meeting notes here]"

STEP 4: Review and Distribute

STEP 5: Track Action Items

'ChatGPT, Meeting note-taking app, Project management tool',
'5 minutes per meeting',
'beginner',
'Meeting notes or transcription, Basic project management knowledge',
'Save 2-3 hours per week, improve accountability, ensure nothing falls through cracks, faster follow-up',
'free'),

('Competitive Analysis Automation',
'Quickly research and analyze competitors to identify differentiation opportunities, saving 4-5 hours per week on market research.',
'Strategy',
'STEP 1: Identify Key Competitors
List 3-5 direct competitors in your market.

STEP 2: Use the Competitive Edge Finder Prompt
"Analyze these 3 competitors in the [industry]: [Competitor 1], [Competitor 2], and [Competitor 3]. Identify their strengths, weaknesses, and what my [business type] can do differently to stand out in the Australian market."

Use ChatGPT with web browsing enabled for current information.

STEP 4: Analyze Results

STEP 5: Create Differentiation Strategy
Use insights to refine your unique value proposition and marketing messaging.',
'ChatGPT with web search, Competitor website list, Market research tools',
